WorkItem.Description:
Rawr 2.2.19
Retribution Paladin
Â 
The gear lists are not filtering out items available only to the opposite faction - for example, Gauntlets of Mounting/Rising Anger both display.  The exception to this is that it is correctly filtering tier pieces, so for my human Paladin Turalyon's is displayed but when I switch to Blood Elf it correctly shows Liadrin's instead.

Comments.Message: Not a bug. Filtering by faction requires faction data, which comes from the Armory, which doesn't have all 258 items.
Also, Wowhead does not seem to have Faction data - try updating your entire item cache from the Armory (or, for a quicker but less comprehensive option, load possible upgrades from Armory).
